# Python requirements file for testing
# Various formats and edge cases

# Pinned versions
flask==2.3.2
requests==2.31.0
django==4.2.1

# Range specifiers
numpy>=1.24.0,<2.0.0
pandas>=2.0.0

# With extras
requests[security]==2.31.0
celery[redis,auth]==5.3.0

# Editable/VCS (should be skipped)
-e git+https://github.com/example/package.git#egg=example-package

# Comments and empty lines should be ignored

# URL-based (should be skipped)
https://example.com/package.tar.gz

# Environment markers
pywin32==306; sys_platform == 'win32'

# Simple without version (should be skipped - no version)
some-package-without-version
